com.android.ex.carousel

Class CarouselRS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.ex.carousel.CarouselRS

  • public class CarouselRS
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a support class for Carousel renderscript. It handles most of the low-level interactions with Renderscript as well as dispatching events.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      • setForceBlendCardsWithZ

        public void setForceBlendCardsWithZ(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether the background texture and default card geometry are to be drawn with respect to the depth buffer (both reading from it and writing to it). This method is a specialization of functionality that can be done with greater flexibility by setStoreConfigs. Calling setForceBlendCardsWithZ() after calling setStoreConfigs() results in the values set in setStoreConfigs() being discarded.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to read from and write to the depth buffer, false to ignore it
